ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Mesmerisation
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t think it is true. When we camped him a while back, once we cleared the room, we hang out on the stage and pulled to it from behind, from the entrance
ygData.messageBody:
I don't think it is true. When we camped him a while
back, once we cleared the room, we hang out on the
stage and pulled to it from behind, from the entrance
and sometimes the hallway. He spawned 4 out of first 5
times, then not for the next 3, then again. So I
suspect that it is random.

Arcius

> Rumor has it though in the preacher room if you walk
> on the stage it will
> cause the Preacher not to spawn, Is this true? He
> only spawned twice all
> day yesterday (and my group was very careful not to
> walk on the stage.
> heh). Any truth in this? :)
